name: Shopify Basic
description: An affordable plan for new businesses, offering essential e-commerce tools, a customizable online store, and access to Shopify’s powerful dashboard.

name: Shopify
description: A comprehensive plan that includes advanced reporting, professional e-commerce tools, and better shipping discounts for growing businesses.

name: Shopify Advanced
description: An advanced plan for scaling businesses, providing detailed analytics, custom reporting, and lowest transaction fees.

name: Shopify Plus
description: An enterprise-level solution for high-volume businesses, featuring full customization, automation tools, and priority support.

name: Shopify POS (Point of Sale)
description: A powerful retail point-of-sale system that allows businesses to sell in physical stores while syncing inventory with their online store.

name: Shopify Payments
description: A built-in payment processing solution that eliminates third-party payment fees and allows seamless transactions directly within Shopify.

name: Shopify Themes
description: A collection of professionally designed themes that merchants can use to create visually stunning online stores tailored to their brand.

name: Shopify Apps & Plugins
description: An extensive marketplace offering thousands of apps to enhance store functionality, including marketing, SEO, and automation tools.

name: Shopify Dropshipping
description: A streamlined dropshipping solution allowing businesses to sell products without managing inventory, using apps like Oberlo and Spocket.

name: Shopify Email Marketing
description: A built-in email marketing tool that allows merchants to create, send, and track email campaigns directly from their Shopify dashboard.

name: Shopify Starter
description: A cost-effective plan for entrepreneurs who want to sell through social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram, with a simple checkout link.

name: Shopify Basic
description: An affordable plan offering essential e-commerce tools, a customizable store, and access to Shopify’s powerful dashboard.

name: Shopify Standard
description: A plan that includes professional e-commerce tools, better shipping discounts, and enhanced reporting for growing businesses.

name: Shopify Advanced
description: A premium plan for scaling businesses with detailed analytics, custom reporting, and lowest transaction fees.

name: Shopify Plus
description: An enterprise-level solution with automation tools, full customization, and priority support for high-volume merchants.

name: Shopify Payments
description: A built-in payment processing solution that allows businesses to accept credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay without third-party fees.

name: Shopify Balance
description: A financial management tool that allows merchants to track earnings, make payments, and get cashback rewards for purchases made through Shopify.

name: Shopify Capital
description: A funding solution that provides business loans and cash advances to Shopify merchants based on sales performance.

name: Shopify POS Lite
description: A mobile POS system for processing in-person sales using an iPhone, iPad, or Android device with integrated payments.

name: Shopify POS Pro
description: An advanced POS system for retail stores, including staff roles, smart inventory management, and omnichannel sales features.

name: Shopify Retail Kit
description: A hardware bundle that includes a Shopify POS card reader, dock, barcode scanner, and receipt printer.

name: Shopify Email Marketing
description: A built-in email marketing tool that allows merchants to create, send, and track email campaigns directly from their Shopify dashboard.

name: Shopify Chat
description: A live chat widget that allows merchants to engage with customers in real-time and improve sales conversions.

name: Shopify Discounts & Promotions
description: A feature that allows merchants to create discount codes, automatic promotions, and gift cards to boost sales.

name: Shopify Themes
description: A collection of professionally designed themes that merchants can use to create visually stunning online stores tailored to their brand.

name: Shopify Apps & Plugins
description: An extensive marketplace offering thousands of apps to enhance store functionality, including marketing, SEO, and automation tools.

name: Shopify Dropshipping
description: A streamlined dropshipping solution allowing businesses to sell products without managing inventory, using apps like Oberlo and Spocket.

name: Shopify Fulfillment Network
description: A logistics network that handles inventory storage, packing, and shipping for Shopify merchants.
